properties.entry: The firstname must contain latin uppercase characters
The lastname must contain latin uppercase characters

The email must start with Alphanumeric characters and end with a '@' Symbol. The email's domain name must start with Alphanumeric follow by first level Tld (.com, .gr, ...) and optional follow by a second level Tld (.com.au, .com.my, ...), where second level Tld must start with a dot “.” and length must equal or more than 2 characters.
Some example of valid email addresses are described below:
  • dskarpetis@hotmail.com, dskarpetis-100@hotmail.com, dskarpetis.100@hotmail.com
  • dskarpetis111@dskarpetis.com, dskarpetis-100@dskarpetis.net, dskarpetis.100@dskarpetis.com.au
  • dskarpetis+100@gmail.com, dskarpetis-100@hotmail-test.com

The username length must be at least 5 latin characters and maximum length of 20, with any character (lowercase or uppercase), digit or special symbol “_-” only.
Some example of valid username are described below:
  • dskarpetis
  • dskarpetis_2002
  • DskaRpetis-2002
  • dska-4_rpetis

The password length must be at least 8 latin characters and maximum length of 20, with at least one digit, one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter and one special symbol ("!@#$%^&*()_+-=]").
Some example of valid username are described below:
  • dSkarpet-250
  • wAterAqua1A@
The user must be at least 18 years old.
Please fill in at least one field!
Username already exists, enter a different username.
Email already exists, enter a different email.
